projects.title: Gradient
projects.description: Gradient is a web application aimed towards students for making studying more enjoyable. It has a built-in Pomodoro timer hooked to a leaderboard, and an AI tool that summarizes and improves formatting of study notes.

projects.title: Omninventory
projects.description: Omninventory is an Android application that allows users to keep track of their inventory. It has a built-in barcode scanner, and a feature that allows users to share their inventory with others.

projects.title: Lock My Game
projects.description: Lock My Game is a Python application that allows users to lock their apps for a certain amonut of time. It has a built-in timer that prevents selected apps from opening for a set time to improve focus.

projects.title: Creddi
projects.description: Creddi is a web application that allows students keep track of their credit for the CompE Club Store. It has a built-in credit calculator that helps students keep track of how much they owe. With an authentication system, so students can log in and see their credit.

projects.title: AlbertaLoop Software Team
projects.description: AlbertaLoop is a team that is working on a Hyperloop pod for the SpaceX Hyperloop competition. The software team is responsible for the communication between the sensors and the main computer, as well as the communication between the main computer and the control system.

projects.title: Sustainability Task List
projects.description: Sustainability Task List is a web application that gamify doing sustainable tasks. It has a built-in task list that allows users to add, delete, update tasks, and assign points to doing these tasks. It also has a built-in calendar that allows users to see their tasks on a calendar.
